ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Twisting Questions
ygData.messageBody:
Isn't berserker over level 44?

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Reece Tom R CPT 25 ID L G4(n)
> [mailto:g4mntofcr@...]
> Sent: Tuesday, November 14, 2000 1:36 PM
> To: eqbards@egroups.com
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] Twisting Questions
>
>
> Just wondering why you would go with Celerity over Berserker
> in a group
> heavy with melee folks? Celerity adds a little more haste
> than Berserker,
> but Berserker will also increase STR and provide more AC than
> Celerity.
> IMO, the extra STR and AC from Berserker outweighs the slight
> haste bonus
> Celerity provides.
>
> Galtin
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Bill Mann [mailto:dabard@...]
> Sent: Monday, November 13, 2000 6:04 AM
> To: eqbards@egroups.com
> Subject: Re: [eqbards] Twisting Questions
>
> Groups heavy with melee'rs: Manasong for casters plus
> Celerity and Hymn (or
> possibly Chant of Battle) for melee'rs, grab my weapons and
> jump into the
> fray :o)
>
> -=B=-
> 44th
> The Rathe
>
>
> [Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
